title: This week’s top stories: Fitbit for irregular heart rhythm, Pixel Watch fitness sensor, more
content:
In this week’s top stories: Fitbit launches monitoring for irregular heart rhythms on select trackers, Pixel Watch appears to borrow its fitness sensor from Fitbit, Nothing shows off its Android launcher, and more.

more…

The post This week’s top stories: Fitbit for irregular heart rhythm, Pixel Watch fitness sensor, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Top Stories: Fitbit irregular heart rhythms tracking, Pixel Watch may borrow Fitbit sensor, Nothing shows off its Android launcher, and more.
